attributes.action: Allow pharmacies to prescribe cannabis to patients
attributes.additional_details:
Legalise cannabis use to patients only when prescribed through a pharmacy. This will allow the government to keep a track on who uses this drug and who needs it. As clearly there are medicinal purposes, but the current stigma of recreational use has made it illeagal in the uk, the givernement can still charge tax on this cannabis should only be allowed to be smoked in personal residences and sane rules as alcohol should apply where as no one under the influence may smoke and drive.

This will help the economy, and take the dealers away from the streets. If alcohol can cause liver damamge but the government doesnt ban this, and it is addictive but underlooked then cannabis and its medicinal purpose shouldnt be shunned away...lets get this one right and get it helping the patients and the economy...
